Welcome to Carbone Metal Fabricator, Inc.
For fifty years, Carbone Metal Fabricator's experienced designers and craftsmen have combined state-of-the-art technology with careful hand-finishing to produce superior quality custom-fabricated stainless steel, metal and millwork products that withstand the stresses of continual commercial use. We are well known for our unique ability to deliver jewelry quality products on time and within budget!
Our versatile manufacturing operation and dedicated employees enable us to meet the needs of a broad range of customers. Whether the final product is for a fast-food restaurant, the kitchen of a fine dining establishment, or the research laboratory of a biotechnology firm, at Carbone Metal Fabricator, we produce items to meet your specifications and the high standards of the National Sanitation Foundation (NSF) . Please stop by our factory at any time. We would be proud to give you a tour. And don't hesitate to call us for a quote on any of your custom stainless steel and millwork requirements.
